tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robotic_arms_sensor_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    arm_name VARCHAR(50),
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE arm_metrics (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  arm_id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 speed FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE robotic_arms_data (
  arm_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  position_x FLOAT,
  position_y FLOAT,
  position_z FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Sensors (
 sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 sensor_name VARCHAR(255),
 arm_id INT,
 sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
 sensor_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Arms (
 arm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 arm_name VARCHAR(255),
 arm_type VARCHAR(50),
 arm_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Robot (
 robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 robot_name VARCHAR(255),
 robot_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Arm_Sensors (
 arm_id INT,
 sensor_id INT,
 PRIMARY KEY (arm_id, sensor_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (arm_id) REFERENCES Arms(arm_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Sensors(sensor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Robot_Arms (
 robot_id INT,
 arm_id INT,
 PRIMARY KEY (robot_id, arm_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robot(robot_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (arm_id) REFERENCES Arms(arm_id)
)
